# pause()

**Instance Method**

Pauses processing in the session.

## Declaration

```swift
func pause()
```

## Discussion

While paused, the session doesn’t track device motion or capture scene imagery, nor does it coordinate with its [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSession/delegate] object or update any associated [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/RealityKit/RealityView] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/RealityKit/ARView] object.

## Configuring and running a session

- **run(_:options:)**: Starts AR processing for the session with the specified configuration and options.
- **identifier**: A unique identifier of the running session.
- **ARSession.RunOptions**: Options for transitioning an AR session’s current state when you change its configuration.
- **configuration**: An object that defines motion and scene tracking behaviors for the session.
